traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ceremorph has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The ceremorph makes one Slam attack and one Tentacles attack. The ceremorph can replace one of the attacks with a Mind Bolt attack, if available.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or have the {@condition stunned} condition until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} Humanoid {@condition grappled} by the ceremorph. 55 (10d10 damage) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ceremorph kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Bolt (3/Day)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or have the {@condition stunned} condition until the end of its next turn.
